TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi serializable beforefieldinit RegionInfo extends System.Object

summary.span: Contains information about the country/region.

span.span: Contains information about the country/region.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不同於類別類別不代表使用者喜好設定並不會根據使用者的語言或文化特性。Unlike the class, the class does not represent user preferences and does not depend on the user's language or culture. ## RegionInfo 物件相關聯的名稱Names Associated with a RegionInfo Object 名稱物件是其中一個國家/地區在 ISO 3166 中定義的兩個字母代碼。The name of a object is one of the two-letter codes defined in ISO 3166 for country/region. 案例並不重要。Case is not significant. ， ，和屬性會傳回適當的程式碼以大寫表示。The , , and properties return the appropriate codes in uppercase. 如需目前清單名稱，請參閱[英文國家 （地區） 名稱和程式碼項目](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=190591)ISO 網站上。For the current list of names, see [English country names and code elements](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=190591) on the ISO website. ## 具現化 RegionInfo 物件Instantiating a RegionInfo Object 具現化物件，您將傳遞建構函式的兩個字母的區域名稱，例如"US"美國，或名稱之特定文化特性，例如"EN-US"代表英文 （美國）。To instantiate a object, you pass the constructor either a two-letter region name, such as "US" for the United States, or the name of a specific culture, such as "en-US" for English (United States). 不過，我們建議您使用的特定文化特性名稱，而非兩個字母的區域名稱，因為物件不是完整的語言無關。However, we recommend that you use a specific culture name instead of a two-letter region name, because a object is not completely language-independent. 數個屬性，包括， ，和，取決於文化特性名稱。Several properties, including , , and , depend on culture names. 下列範例說明中的差異代表比利時的三個物件的屬性值。The following example illustrates the difference in property values for three objects that represent Belgium. 第一個從具現化的區域名稱 （相當），而第二個和第三個具現化的文化特性名稱 (fr-相當法文 （比利時） 和 nl-相當為荷蘭文 （比利時），分別)。The first is instantiated from a region name (BE) only, while the second and third are instantiated from culture names (fr-BE for French (Belgium) and nl-BE for Dutch (Belgium), respectively). 這個範例會使用反映來擷取屬性值，每個物件。The example uses reflection to retrieve the property values of each object. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.RegionInfo#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo/CS/propertyvalues1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.RegionInfo#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo/VB/propertyvalues1.vb#2)] 在下列情況下，使用文化特性名稱而非國家/地區名稱上，當您具現化物件：In scenarios such as the following, use culture names instead of country/region names when you instantiate a object: - 當語言名稱非常重要。When the language name is of primary importance. 比方說，如 es 美國文化特性名稱，您可能需要您的應用程式，以顯示"Estados Unidos"，而不是 「 美國 」。For example, for the es-US culture name, you'll probably want your application to display "Estados Unidos" instead of "United States". 使用國家/地區的名稱 (US) 單獨產生 「 美國 」，不論語言為何，因此您應該使用的文化特性名稱改為。Using the country/region name (US) alone yields "United States" regardless of the language, so you should work with the culture name instead. - 當您必須考量指令碼的差異。When script differences must be considered. 例如，國家/地區 AZ 處理亞有名稱為 az-Latn-AZ 和 az Cyrl AZ 和英文的文化特性，斯拉夫文指令碼可能會非常不同的國家/地區。For example, the country/region AZ deals with Azerbaijani cultures that have the names az-Latn-AZ and az-Cyrl-AZ, and the Latin and Cyrillic scripts can be very different for this country/region. - 維護的詳細資料時很重要。When maintenance of detail is important. 所傳回的值成員可以不同取決於是否物件具現化所使用的文化特性名稱或區域名稱。The values returned by members can differ depending on whether the object was instantiated by using a culture name or a region name. 例如下, 表列出這些差異傳回值時物件具現化使用的 「 美國 」 區域，"EN-US"文化特性和"es US"文化特性。For example, the following table lists the differences in return values when a object is instantiated by using the "US" region, the "en-US" culture, and the "es-US" culture. |成員Member|「 我們""US"|"EN-US""en-US"|"es US""es-US"| |------------|----------|--------------|--------------| ||美元US Dollar|美元US Dollar|Dólar de EE。UU。Dólar de EE.UU.| ||USUS|zh-TWen-US|es 美國es-US| ||美國United States|美國United States|Estados UnidosEstados Unidos| ||USUS|zh-TWen-US|es 美國es-US| ## Examples 下列範例會示範數個成員的類別。The following example demonstrates several members of the class. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.RegionInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo/CPP/regioninfo.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.RegionInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo/CS/regioninfo.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.RegionInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo/VB/regioninfo.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int32 culture) cil managed

span.span: A culture identifier.

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class based on the country/region associated with the specified culture identifier.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class based on the country/region associated with the specified culture identifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是建議的建構函式具現化物件。 is the recommended constructor for instantiating a object. 不同於需要數值的文化特性識別項做為參數，其參數的建構函式會更容易閱讀文化特性名稱或 country 的程式碼。Unlike the constructor that requires a numeric culture identifier as a parameter, its parameter is a more readable culture name or country code. 文化特性識別項對應至相對應的國家語言支援 (NLS) 地區設定識別碼。The culture identifier is mapped to the corresponding National Language Support (NLS) locale identifier. 詳細的文化特性資訊會出現在[國家語言支援 (NLS) API 參考](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=200048)在 Go Global 開發人員中心。Detailed culture information appears in the [National Language Support (NLS) API Reference](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=200048) at the Go Global Developer Center. 值屬性的新藉由呼叫這個建構函式具現化的物件是國家/地區、 結合的語言和國家/地區碼未使用 ISO 3166 2 個字母代碼。The value of the property of the new object instantiated by calling this constructor is the ISO 3166 2-letter code for the country/region, not the combined language and country/region code. 例如，如果物件具現化的文化特性識別碼 0x0409 的英文 （美國） 文化特性的值屬性為 「 美國 」。For example, if a object is instantiated with the culture identifier 0x0409 for the English (United States) culture, the value of the property is "US". 相反地，如果物件具現化與合併的語言和國家/地區的英文 （美國） 文化特性的值的程式碼 EN-US屬性為"EN-US"。In contrast, if a object is instantiated with the combined language and country/region code en-US for the English (United States) culture, the value of the property is "en-US". ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會比較兩個執行個體以不同的方式所建立。The following code example compares two instances of that were created differently. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.RegionInfo_Equals#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo_Equals/CPP/regioninfo_equals.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.RegionInfo_Equals#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo_Equals/CS/regioninfo_equals.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.RegionInfo_Equals#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo_Equals/VB/regioninfo_equals.vb#1)]

exception.span: specifies either an invariant, custom, or neutral culture.

span.span: specifies either an invariant, custom, or neutral culture.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string name) cil managed

param.name: name
param.span: A string that contains a two-letter code defined in ISO 3166 for country/region.

span.span: A string that contains a two-letter code defined in ISO 3166 for country/region.

param.span: -or- A string that contains the culture name for a specific culture, custom culture, or Windows-only culture.

span.span: -or- A string that contains the culture name for a specific culture, custom culture, or Windows-only culture.

param.span: If the culture name is not in RFC 4646 format, your application should specify the entire culture name instead of just the country/region.

span.span: If the culture name is not in RFC 4646 format, your application should specify the entire culture name instead of just the country/region.

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class based on the country/region or specific culture, specified by name.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class based on the country/region or specific culture, specified by name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `name`參數是其中一個國家/地區，或特定、 自訂或 Windows 專用文化特性名稱所定義的代碼。The `name` parameter is either one of the codes defined for country/region, or a specific, custom, or Windows-only culture name. 案例並不重要。Case is not significant. 不過， 、 ，而屬性會傳回指定的程式碼或文化特性名稱以大寫表示。However, the , the , and the properties return the specified code or culture name in uppercase. 預先定義名稱會列在[國家 （地區） 名稱和程式碼項目](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=190591)ISO 網站上。The predefined names are listed in [Country names and code elements](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=190591) on the ISO website. 您應該提供特定文化特性名稱，而不是只是在國家/地區名稱`name`參數。You should provide the name of a specific culture rather than just a country/region name in the `name` parameter. 例如，EN-US 代表英文 （美國） 或西班牙文 （美國） 的 es 美國最好是美國因為屬性，例如和反映特定的語言。For example, en-US for English (United States) or es-US for Spanish (United States) is preferable to US because properties such as and reflect a specific language. 最好 AZ az-Latn-AZ 或 az-Cyrl-AZ 是因為屬性，例如， ，和反映特定指令碼。az-Latn-AZ or az-Cyrl-AZ is preferable to AZ because properties such as , , and reflect a specific script. 預先定義的文化特性名稱會列在[國家語言支援 (NLS) API 參考](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=200048)在 Go Global 開發人員中心。The predefined culture names are listed in the [National Language Support (NLS) API Reference](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=200048) at the Go Global Developer Center. 請注意，此建構函式的呼叫會擲回如果`name`是中性文化特性 （例如，en-us 代表英文)。Note that a call to this constructor throws an if `name` is a neutral culture (such as en for English). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會比較兩個執行個體以不同的方式所建立。The following code example compares two instances of that were created differently. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.RegionInfo_Equals#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo_Equals/CPP/regioninfo_equals.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.RegionInfo_Equals#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo_Equals/CS/regioninfo_equals.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.RegionInfo_Equals#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo_Equals/VB/regioninfo_equals.vb#1)] 下列程式碼範例會建立的執行個體使用文化特性名稱。The following code example creates instances of using culture names. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.RegionInfo.ctorCultureName#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo.ctorCultureName/CPP/regioninfo_ctorculturename.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.RegionInfo.ctorCultureName#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo.ctorCultureName/CS/regioninfo_ctorculturename.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.RegionInfo.ctorCultureName#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo.ctorCultureName/VB/regioninfo_ctorculturename.vb#1)]

span.span: is .

exception.span: is not a valid country/region name or specific culture name.

span.span: is not a valid country/region name or specific culture name.

span.para: 這個建構函式接受只有特定文化特性或國家/地區碼。不過，某些中性文化特性名稱會與國家/地區碼相同。在此情況下，會解譯為國家/地區碼，而非中性文化特性名稱和這個建構函式不會擲回。

This constructor accepts only specific cultures or country/region codes. However, some neutral culture names are the same as country/region codes. In this case, is interpreted as a country/region code rather than a neutral culture name, and this constructor does not throw an .

span.span: The name, in English, of the currency used in the country/region.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範屬性。The following code example demonstrates the property. [!code-cpp[sys.glob.regioninfo.rgn5props#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/sys.glob.regioninfo.rgn5props/cpp/rgn5props.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[sys.glob.regioninfo.rgn5props#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/sys.glob.regioninfo.rgn5props/CS/rgn5props.cs#1)] [!code-vb[sys.glob.regioninfo.rgn5props#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/sys.glob.regioninfo.rgn5props/VB/rgn5props.vb#1)]

public: virtual property System::String ^ CurrencyNativeName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: Gets the name of the currency used in the country/region, formatted in the native language of the country/region.

span.span: Gets the name of the currency used in the country/region, formatted in the native language of the country/region.

value.span: 國家/地區中使用之貨幣的原生名稱 (以與 ISO 3166 國家/地區碼相關聯的語言格式表示)。

span.span: The native name of the currency used in the country/region, formatted in the language associated with the ISO 3166 country/region code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果目前使用特定文化特性建立物件和對應的國家/地區中使用一種以上語言屬性擷取特定文化特性相關聯的貨幣名稱。If the current object is created with a specific culture and more than one language is used in the corresponding country/region, the property retrieves the currency name associated with the specific culture. 這個屬性的值取決於特定國家/地區相關聯的語言。The value of this property depends on the language that is associated with a particular country/region. 因此，如果您想要使用屬性，您應該具現化物件，並傳遞建構函式結合的語言和國家/地區碼。Therefore, if you intend to use the property, you should instantiate the object by passing the constructor a combined language and country/region code. 例如，如果，結合的語言和國家/地區碼為"EN-CA"代表英文 （加拿大），此值的具現化物件及其屬性是 「 加拿大元 」。For example, if a object is instantiated with a combined language and country/region code of "en-CA" for English (Canada), the value of its property is "Canadian Dollar". 如果具現化，結合的語言和國家/地區碼為"FR-CA"的法文 （加拿大） 的值及其屬性是 「 貨幣 canadien"。If it is instantiated with a combined language and country/region code of "fr-CA" for French (Canada), the value of its property is "Dollar canadien". 因此，建立`RegionInfo`只國家/地區名稱 (在此情況下為"CA") 的物件不是不夠明確，無法區別適當原生的貨幣名稱。Therefore, creating the `RegionInfo` object with only a country/region name ("CA" in this case) is not specific enough to distinguish the appropriate native currency name. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範屬性。The following code example demonstrates the property. [!code-cpp[sys.glob.regioninfo.rgn5props#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/sys.glob.regioninfo.rgn5props/cpp/rgn5props.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[sys.glob.regioninfo.rgn5props#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/sys.glob.regioninfo.rgn5props/CS/rgn5props.cs#1)] [!code-vb[sys.glob.regioninfo.rgn5props#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/sys.glob.regioninfo.rgn5props/VB/rgn5props.vb#1)]

summary.span: Gets the currency symbol associated with the country/region.

span.span: The currency symbol associated with the country/region.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 例如，美國的貨幣符號是"$"。For example, the currency symbol for the United States is "$". 如果目前使用特定文化特性建立物件和對應的國家/地區中使用一種以上語言屬性會傳回相關聯的特定文化特性的貨幣符號。If the current object is created with a specific culture and more than one language is used in the corresponding country/region, the property returns the currency symbol associated with the specific culture. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示的屬性類別。The following code example displays the properties of the class. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties/CPP/regioninfo_properties.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties/CS/regioninfo_properties.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties/VB/regioninfo_properties.vb#1)]

span.span: The that represents the country/region used by the current thread.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性的值根據透過 [控制台] 的 [地區及語言選項] 部分中選取的文化特性。The value of this property is based on the culture selected through the regional and language options portion of Control Panel. 不過，該資訊可以變更的生命期限內。However, that information can change during the life of the . 類別不會自動偵測的變更在系統設定，但呼叫時，會更新屬性方法。The class does not automatically detect changes in the system settings, but the property is updated when you call the method.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property DisplayName As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ DisplayName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: Gets the full name of the country/region in the language of the localized version of .NET Framework.

span.span: Gets the full name of the country/region in the language of the localized version of .NET Framework.

value.span: .NET Framework 當地語系化版本語言之國家/地區的完整名稱。

span.span: The full name of the country/region in the language of the localized version of .NET Framework.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會顯示當地語系化版本的.NET Framework 語言的國家/地區名稱。The property displays the country/region name in the language of the localized version of .NET Framework. 例如，屬性以英文顯示國家/地區英文版的.NET framework 和西班牙文西班牙文版本的.NET framework 上。For example, the property displays the country/region in English on the English version of the .NET Framework, and in Spanish on the Spanish version of the .NET Framework. 值屬性取自資源檔中的目前使用者介面文化特性，由語言。The value of the property is taken from the resource files in the language of the current user interface culture, represented by . 自訂區域，或從作業系統合成那些可能沒有資源資訊，請此情況下，值的值相同屬性。Custom regions or those synthesized from the operating system might not have resource information, in which case the value for is the same as the value of the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示的屬性類別。The following code example displays the properties of the class. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties/CPP/regioninfo_properties.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties/CS/regioninfo_properties.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties/VB/regioninfo_properties.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會覆寫。This method overrides . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會比較兩個執行個體以不同的方式所建立。The following code example compares two instances of that were created differently. MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property GeoId As Integer
public: virtual property int GeoId { int get(); };

summary.span: Gets a unique identification number for a geographical region, country, city, or location.

span.span: Gets a unique identification number for a geographical region, country, city, or location.

value.span: 32 位元帶正負號的數字，專門識別地理位置。

span.span: A 32-bit signed number that uniquely identifies a geographical location.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應用程式應該使用屬性，以提供特定文化特性的服務給客戶。The application should use the property to provide culture-specific services to customers. 例如，屬性可以用做為索引鍵來存取資料庫記錄，包含關於國家/地區的特定資訊。For example, the property can be used as a key to access a database record that contains specific information about a country/region. 這個屬性值對應於 Windows`GetUserGeoID`函式。This property value corresponds to the Windows `GetUserGeoID` function. 如需地理識別碼的清單，請參閱[地理位置資料表](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=191287)MSDN Library 中。For a list of geographical identifiers, see [Table of Geographical Locations](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=191287) in the MSDN Library. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範屬性。The following code example demonstrates the property. [!code-cpp[sys.glob.regioninfo.rgn5props#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/sys.glob.regioninfo.rgn5props/cpp/rgn5props.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[sys.glob.regioninfo.rgn5props#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/sys.glob.regioninfo.rgn5props/CS/rgn5props.cs#1)] [!code-vb[sys.glob.regioninfo.rgn5props#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/sys.glob.regioninfo.rgn5props/VB/rgn5props.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property Name As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: Gets the name or ISO 3166 two-letter country/region code for the current object.

span.span: Gets the name or ISO 3166 two-letter country/region code for the current object.

value.span: 所指定的值參數建構函式。

span.span: The value specified by the parameter of the constructor.
The return value is in uppercase.

value.span: -定義於 ISO 3166 中國家/地區所指定的兩個字母代碼參數建構函式。

span.span: -or- The two-letter code defined in ISO 3166 for the country/region specified by the parameter of the constructor.
The return value is in uppercase.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果目前物件會透過使用文化特性識別項參數的建構函式屬性值是其中一個國家/地區在 ISO 3166 中定義的兩個字母代碼，而且格式為大寫。If the current object is created with the constructor that takes a culture identifier parameter, the property value is one of the two-letter codes defined in ISO 3166 for the country/region and is formatted in uppercase. 例如，美國的兩個字母代碼是"US"。For example, the two-letter code for the United States is "US". 如果目前物件會透過建構函式，並傳遞完整的文化特性名稱，例如"EN-US"，屬性值是完整的文化特性名稱，且不只是區域名稱。If the current object is created with the constructor and is passed a full culture name such as "en-US", the property value is a full culture name and not just the region name. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示的屬性類別。The following code example displays the properties of the class. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties/CPP/regioninfo_properties.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties/CS/regioninfo_properties.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties/VB/regioninfo_properties.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property NativeName As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ NativeName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: Gets the name of a country/region formatted in the native language of the country/region.

span.span: Gets the name of a country/region formatted in the native language of the country/region.

value.span: 國家/地區的原生名稱 (以與 ISO 3166 國家/地區碼相關聯的語言格式表示)。

span.span: The native name of the country/region formatted in the language associated with the ISO 3166 country/region code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 屬性擷取完整文化特性名稱，如果`RegionInfo`使用完整的文化特性名稱，來建構物件。The property retrieves a full culture name if the `RegionInfo` object is constructed using a full culture name. 我們建議您使用的文化特性名稱 — 例如，"EN-US"代表英文 （美國） — 若要存取屬性。We recommend that you use the culture name—for example, "en-US" for English (United States)—to access the property. 用於這個屬性的字串取決於與國家/地區相關聯的語言。The string used for this property depends on the language associated with the country/region. 例如，文化特性名稱 EN-US 代表英文 （美國） 和 es 美式西班牙文 （美國） 可以擷取 Windows Vista 上不同的值。For example, the culture names en-US for English (United States) and es-US for Spanish (United States) can retrieve different values on Windows Vista. 因此，建立`RegionInfo`只有美國國家/地區名稱的物件不是不夠明確，無法區別適當的字串。Therefore, creating the `RegionInfo` object with only a country/region name of US is not specific enough to distinguish the appropriate string. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範屬性。The following code example demonstrates the property. [!code-cpp[sys.glob.regioninfo.rgn5props#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/sys.glob.regioninfo.rgn5props/cpp/rgn5props.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[sys.glob.regioninfo.rgn5props#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/sys.glob.regioninfo.rgn5props/CS/rgn5props.cs#1)] [!code-vb[sys.glob.regioninfo.rgn5props#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/sys.glob.regioninfo.rgn5props/VB/rgn5props.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property ThreeLetterISORegionName As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ ThreeLetterISORegionName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: Gets the three-letter code defined in ISO 3166 for the country/region.

span.span: Gets the three-letter code defined in ISO 3166 for the country/region.

value.span: 為國家/地區定義於 ISO 3166 中的三個字母代碼。

span.span: The three-letter code defined in ISO 3166 for the country/region.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含針對國家/地區定義於 ISO 3166 中的三個字母代碼。The property contains the three-letter code defined in ISO 3166 for this country/region. 例如，美國的三個字母代碼是 「 美國 」。For example, the three-letter code for United States is "USA". 案例並不重要。Case is not significant. 不過， 、 ，而屬性會傳回適當的程式碼以大寫表示。However, the , the , and the properties return the appropriate code in uppercase. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示的屬性類別。The following code example displays the properties of the class. value.span: 為國家/地區定義於 ISO 3166 中的兩個字母代碼。

span.span: The two-letter code defined in ISO 3166 for the country/region.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 名稱是其中一個國家/地區在 ISO 3166 中定義的兩個字母代碼。The name is one of the two-letter codes defined in ISO 3166 for country/region. 例如，美國的兩個字母代碼是"US"。For example, the two-letter code for United States is "US". > [!IMPORTANT] > 在某些情況下，屬性可能會有兩個以上的字元。In some cases, the property may have more than two characters. 例如，值加勒比海區域的屬性是 「 029"。For example, the value of the property for the Caribbean region is "029". 案例並不重要。Case is not significant. 不過， 、 ，而屬性會傳回適當的程式碼以大寫表示。However, the , the , and the properties return the appropriate code in uppercase. > [!WARNING] > 如果您想要保存物件或處理序之間通訊它，您應該將它執行個體化使用完整文化特性名稱，而不是雙字母 ISO 區域代碼。If you want to persist a object or communicate it between processes, you should instantiate it by using a full culture name rather than a two-letter ISO region code. 因為屬性取決於指令碼和語言，具現化使用只有區域的程式碼的物件失去內容和資料。Because properties depend on script and language, instantiating a object by using only a region code loses context and data. 預先定義名稱會列在[英文國家 （地區） 名稱和程式碼項目](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=190591)ISO 網站上。The predefined names are listed in [English country names and code elements](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=190591) on the ISO website. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示的屬性類別。The following code example displays the properties of the class. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties/CPP/regioninfo_properties.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties/CS/regioninfo_properties.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.RegionInfo_Properties/VB/regioninfo_properties.vb#1)]
